Txt_AppearanceChange_Message_Start.Text:
Gooreetings!<KEY_WAIT>
I suppooze you're here to change your appearance.<NO_INPUT>

Txt_AppearanceChange_Message_First.Text:
My name's Healizah, by the way. I might not look it, but I'm a fashion gooru!
<KEY_WAIT>
I can cut your hair and dye it, even change your voice. (slurp) There's not much I can't do!
<KEY_WAIT>
I'll have you looking your best in no slime<--->for a nominal sum of goold coins, of course.<KEY_WAIT>
So how about it? Is there someone whooze appearance you'd like to change?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_AppearanceChange_Message_Top.Text: Is there someone whooze appearance you'd like to change?

Txt_AppearanceChange_Message_LooksSelect.Text: Okay, you're gooing to change {ACTOR}'s appearance. How do you want <IfGender_ACTOR(him,her,it)> to look?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_AppearanceChange_Message_HairColorSe.Text: (slurp) Do you have a hair colour in mind?<NO_INPUT>
Erm, {HERO}'s hairstyle is already the height of fashion. I can dye it, though! Any goo colours in mind?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_AppearanceChange_Message_VoiceSelect.Text: (slurp) Do you have a particular voice in mind?

Txt_AppearanceChange_Message_NoChange.Text: Hold on, everything's like it was when you walked in here! Are you sure you're not gooing to change anything?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_AppearanceChange_Message_LooksChange.Text: Okay, this look will cost {VALUE} goold <IfSing_VALUE(coin,coins)>. Is that alright?
Thank you jelly much! Now, just a moment, please...

Txt_AppearanceChange_Message_CanNotChang.Text: Stop. Just stop. You want to change the appearance of a dead gooman? Sorry, that's a line I refooze to cross.
Look, {HERO}, you're a goo-looking <IfGender_HERO(lad,lass,)>. I really wouldn't change a thing if I were you...

Txt_AppearanceChange_Message_Shortage.Text: Oh dear... You, my friend, are broke. Come back when you've saved up {VALUE} goold <IfSing_VALUE(coin,coins)>, okay?

Txt_AppearanceChange_Message_AddChangeCo.Text: Anyone else whooze appearance you'd like to change?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_AppearanceChange_Message_Finish.Text: Drop by whenever you feel like trying a new look. Goobye!

Txt_AppearanceChange_Message_CanNotChang.Text: Hmm... Sorry, it seems <IfSolo(you can't,none of you can)> change your appearance right now.

Txt_AppearanceChange_Message_NoChangeLoo.Text: But that's the same look as before... Are you sure you want to goo with this?<NO_INPUT>
